name: V_EHI_NCS_FILTER_RQG
description: This view creates one column of unique requisition groupers linked to a communication record.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the customer service communication.

columns.name: GROUPER_ID
columns.description: This is the primary key for Requisition Grouper tables and refers to the ID number of the Requisition Grouper source.
